meters.title: Meters
meters.description: Meters is a service that helps companies keep track of their energy consumption and temperatures
meters.how_many_temp: How many temperature sensors do you want to deploy?
meters.how_many_mbus: How many resource sensors do you want to deploy?
meters.offer_email_subject: Quotation request for the Meters product
meters.notice: Only meters eqquiped with the M-BUS technology can be read from. Naito One does not offer the replacement of the meters in it's services. Any change must be undertaken by the client. A Wifi network must cover the location of the sensors. Naito One does not offer the installation or extension of Wifi networks in it's services. The update of the network must be undertaken by the client.
